reviewText: I don't know how I found out about this DVD, but I'm sure glad I did. I've owned the disc for a week and played it three times already. Since it's two hours long, that pretty much tells you how much I enjoy this.If you like to "boogie" with toe-tapping, feel-good oldies - and what true rock 'n roller doesn't? - this is a great find. It's cheap here, too, at Amazon - an incredible bargain.Bill Wyman, the long-time (30 years) bassist for the Rolling Stones, formed his own group - a bunch of great musicians and singers - who just like to have fun and a have a great time performing rock songs of the past, along with a few jazz, soul and other genres.The "guitarists' guitarist," Albert Lee, joins Wyman along with the great singer/keyboardist Georgie Fame, two lively sax players, a Nina Simone-type singer, a drummer, another guitarist and a guy named Mike Sanchez who is one of the best entertainers I've ever seen.I can't stop smiling every time I play this DVD.
summary: Two Hours Of Feel-Good Old Time Rock 'N Roll
Title: N/A

reviewText: Every performance a standout! Keyboard and vocalist Mike Sanchez steals the show!But, hey, Bill Wyman, please lose the cigarette during your playing. Kinda takes everything down a notch, from an otherwise great performance. Plus, we want you (and your band mates) to stick around many more years to make great music.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Great view of the blues and swing that this group makes.  The keyboard player is crazy!
Title: N/A

reviewText: It was  good to see Bill Wyman still playing.  The music was great .  It's a far cry from the Rolling Stones, but you can see that he loves playing music and a great show.

reviewText: I was under the impression that Bill would be doing the singing on  a lot of these but he was standing back like he did with the Rolling Stones.  Not a true "Bill" CD as far as I am concerned
